name: Leonardo: Renaissance Man Quiz | Leonardo da Vinci | 10 Questions

questions.text: With what area is Leonardo most closely associated?
questions.explanation:
Florence.

	He spent time in Milan (and other places), but Florence was 'his town'.

questions.text: One of Leonardo's most famous works is 'The Battle of ...'
questions.explanation:
Anghiari.

	It was apparently a conflict between forces from Florence and Milan.

questions.text: Which prominent psychologist wrote a work that analyzed Leonardo and discussed one of Leonardo's childhood memories?
questions.explanation:
Sigmund Freud.

	Freud seized on one of Leonardo's memories and interpreted it along psychoanalytic lines. Unfortunately, there may have been a mis-translation involved.

questions.text: Which is true of Leonardo's early years?
options: He was the youngest of several children
He never knew his mother or father
He was the oldest of several children
questions.explanation:
He was illegitimate.

	He was illegitimate, but knew the identity of his father, mother and step-mother.

questions.text: Leonardo experienced some difficulty when he was charged with what offense?
questions.explanation:
Immoral conduct.

	It is commonly believed that Leonardo was gay. There were some young boys ...

questions.text: Which is not a work by Leonardo?
questions.explanation:
The Night Watch.

	That one is by Rembrandt.

All of these.

	He had interests in - and a talent for - just about everything.

questions.text: Which is true of Leonardo's Mona Lisa?
questions.correct: The model was the wife of a customer
options: He painted it for his own pleasure, rather than for pay by a client
The model was an unmarried woman
questions.explanation: The model was the wife of a customer.
